    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Object representing the Canvas which contains Shapes are drawn on.
    Circle
    Concrete definition of a circle defined using the inherited properties of Ellipse.
    ConvexPolygon
    Concrete definition of a convex polygon defined by (in addition to the inherited properties from Shape): vertices encoded as an array of Points (which gets set at object instantiation and can be mutated but is never destroyed).
    Ellipse
    Concrete definition of an ellipse defined by (in addition to the inherited properties from Shape): a semi-major and semi-minor axis (or radii), which are both of type double.
    ProjectCDriver
    Project C Driver for auto-grading.
    Rectangle
    Concrete definition of a rectangle defined using the inherited properties of ConvexPolygon.
    Shape
    Abstract definition of a shape, which has a Color attribute and a boolean attribute for indicating whether ths shape is filled (true) or wireframed (false).
    Square
    Concrete definition of a rectangle defined using the inherited properties of Rectangle.
    Triangle
    Concrete definition of a triangle defined by the inherited properties from ConvexPolygon.
